formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( C = S_0 N(d_1) - X e^{-rT} N(d_2) \) \( P = X e^{-rT} N(-d_2) - S_0 N(-d_1) \) where \( d_1 = \frac{\ln(\frac{S_0}{X}) + (r + \frac{\sigma^2}{2})T}{\sigma \sqrt{T}} \) and \( d_2 = d_1 - \sigma \sqrt{T} \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
